Package org.daisy.dotify.api.obfl

Provides an API for OBFL.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Expression
    Provides an interface for OBFL-expressions.
    ExpressionFactory
    Provides a factory for expressions.
    ObflParser
    Provides an OBFL-parser.
    ObflParserFactoryService
    Provides an interface for a ObflParserFactory service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExpressionFactoryMaker
    Like all maker classes in the api, this class is only used directly in SPI context.
    ObflParserFactoryMaker
    Like all maker classes in the api, this class is only used directly in SPI context.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ObflParserException
    Provides an exception for conditions occuring when parsing an OBFL-file.

Package org.daisy.dotify.api.obfl Description

Provides an API for OBFL.

The SPI entry points for using this package are:

  • ExpressionFactoryMaker
  • ObflParserFactoryMaker

The OSGi entry points for using this package are:

  • ExpressionFactory
  • ObflParserFactoryService

To add additional implementations, use the following interfaces:

  • ExpressionFactory
  • ObflParserFactoryService
